encodingDesc.p: This file encoded to comply with EpiDoc Guidelines and Schema version 8 http://www.stoa.org/epidoc/gl/5/

revisionDesc.change: Finalized - Revised text and updated metadata.

Vote - Return-Straight-to-Sender - Please implement the following remaining corrections: Add "lost.?lin" at beginning and end (i.e. "1. lost.?lin", cf. the "Leiden+ Help"). There will be two lines numbered 1. Undo the change of line numbers (i.e. it should read "2. [τοῖς πάν]τ̣α τ[αῦτα ἐπι]"). For line fillers use *filler(diple)* (cf. the page "Sigla, Special Characters, Scribal Punctuation, and Glyphs" linked to from the Leiden+ help). Hyphenation in is "14.-", not "15. [-".
Submit - Correction of some mistakes in previous version

Vote - Return-Straight-to-Sender - Add lost.?lin at beginning and end. Open/close square brackets at line beginning/end (e.g. ἀνό̣[σια ἔργα] 3. [καὶ]; in l. 4 the bracket at line end will be omitted). Add accents in l. 3, line filler in ll. 7 and 9, diaeresis in l. 8, change iota subscript to adscript in ll. 4, 5, 11, 14, add underdots in l. 12. Inn l. 13 add missing space: 13.συμφοράν -> 13. συμφοράν. Hyphenation without space in l. 14: 14. - -> 14.-; ll. 17-20 have lacunas at beginning and end and no spaces, e.g. l. 17: 17. [.?].1[.1].2 [.?].
Submit - Added text and markings including the critical apparatus
Finalized - Revised text and updated metadata.

Vote - Return-Straight-to-Sender - Please implement the following remaining corrections: Add "lost.?lin" at beginning and end (i.e. "1. lost.?lin", cf. the "Leiden+ Help").
